text: Pál Széplaki (born 3 February 1945) is a Hungarian equestrian. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Hungary Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Pál Széplaki
